review: Best accessory I've ever bought for my HD TV!!! Works GREAT, I use it to stream Amazon Prime, Netflix, and Flixster. It works seamlessly with all those sites. I would definitely recommend this item to anyone looking for an easy to use product!
author: M. Orona

review: I actually just activated this thing for my parents.  My sister got it for my dad for Fathers Day.  We had to borrow it.  It is awesome.  The picture is HD excellent.  You can access all the online streaming you want and download some fun little gaming apps like Flappy Bird.  We actually have a Chromecast and can't really use it anymore because of software/browser incompatibilities.  We won't be doing Chromecast anymore, we are just going to get one of these Firesticks for ourselves
author: Steffani
